entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:58 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 11:21 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
